name: visioncare-optics-website
description: Component-based VisionCare Optics website with build system

scripts.start: npm run build && python -m http.server 8000 --directory public
scripts.start:windows: npm run build && python -m http.server 8000 --directory public
scripts.dev: npm run build && echo 'Open http://localhost:8000 in your browser'

author: VisionCare Optics
